translation.en: Go see what it is, quickly. Hand me the lantern.
translation.it: Andate a vedere, presto. Passami la lanterna.

translation.en: It's the captain! It's the captain!
-Help Jørgensen. His feet are frozen. -[man 2] Right, come on.
translation.it: - Aiutate Jørgensen. Ha i piedi congelati. - Avanti.

translation.en: -[man 3] Holm's on his way. -[man 1] Quick, Unger. Get the water.
translation.it: Holm sta arrivando. - Presto, Unger. Prendi l'acqua. - Jørgensen, su la testa.
- Presto, Unger. Prendi l'acqua. - Jørgensen, su la testa.

translation.en: -Unger, hurry up with the water. -It's coming!
-[man 4] Raise it. Easy. -[man 1] It's all right. We got you.
translation.it: - Alzalo. Piano. - Va tutto bene. Ci pensiamo noi.

translation.en: -We got you. -[man 4] Take it easy, Jørgensen.
translation.it: - Alzalo. Piano. - Va tutto bene. Ci pensiamo noi. Non ti agitare, Jørgensen.

translation.en: [man 4] Hold these. Take it easy, Jørgensen.
-Do you have some whiskey? -[man 1] Yes. Get the man a drink.
translation.it: - Avete del whisky? - Sì. Dagli da bere.

translation.en: -It's about time we found a use for you. -[laughter]
[Ejnar] Gentlemen, can I have your attention?
translation.it: - Buono. - Posso avere la vostra attenzione?

translation.en: -I want you all to raise your glasses… -[crew] Of course.
translation.it: - Voglio che alziate i calici… - Certo.

translation.en: to the men who gave their lives exploring the last unknown parts of our kingdom.
translation.it: a chi ha dato la vita per esplorare le ultime terre sconosciute del regno.

translation.en: for joining me in fulfilling their mission.
translation.it: per completare con me la loro missione.

translation.en: Our long search didn't go quite as planned.
translation.it: La nostra ricerca non è andata come previsto.

translation.en: As expected, it was hard to trace any signs of the vanished expedition.
translation.it: Come previsto, era difficile trovare segni della spedizione scomparsa.

translation.en: A diary from one of the men.
translation.it: Il diario di uno degli uomini.

translation.en: that apparently shows the location of the cairn
translation.it: che indicherebbe la posizione dell'ometto di sassi

translation.en: where Mylius-Erichsen left his final records of the unknown land.
translation.it: dove Mylius-Erichsen ha lasciato gli ultimi dati sulla terra sconosciuta.

translation.en: A cairn's a stack of stones you can see from far away.
translation.it: È un cumulo di pietre che puoi vedere da lontano.

translation.en: So, therefore, I'll attempt another journey.
Well, this time further, across the ice cap,
to retrieve the findings they left behind.
translation.it: per recuperare ciò che hanno scoperto.

translation.en: This is why we're here, boys.
Without these findings, the North of Greenland could be lost, claimed by the Americans.
translation.it: Altrimenti la Groenlandia del nord verrà rivendicata dagli americani.

translation.en: and I can't do it alone,
translation.it: e non posso farlo da solo,

translation.en: which provides one of you lucky boys with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
translation.it: il che offre a voi fortunati un'occasione unica nella vita.

translation.en: I'll need a volunteer to accompany me.
translation.it: Mi serve un volontario che venga con me.

translation.en: You're kidding, right? Jørgensen's feet were wrecked.
translation.it: - Scherzi? - I piedi di Jørgensen erano distrutti.

translation.en: [Poulsen] Aren't you next in line, Laub?
translation.it: Non sei tu il prossimo, Laub?

translation.en: Shut up, Poulsen. Some of us have family.
translation.it: Taci, Poulsen. C'è chi ha famiglia.

translation.en: Why don't any of you want to go with him?
translation.it: Perché nessuno vuole andare con lui?

translation.en: It's like walking from Moscow to Rome looking for a stack of stones.
translation.it: È come cercare da Mosca a Roma una pila di sassi.

translation.en: [Poulsen] Not to mention doing it with the captain.
He knew all about him before he came aboard, right?
translation.it: Sapeva tutto prima di imbarcarsi, vero?

translation.en: I mean, I've read about him,

translation.it: ma chi non l'ha fatto, giusto?

translation.en: [scoffs] Not everyone's a fan, Iver Iversen.
translation.it: Non tutti sono fanatici, Iver Iversen.

translation.en: -Not everyone can read. Right, Unger? -Try reading this!
translation.it: O sanno leggere. Vero, Unger? Leggi questo.

translation.en: I don't know how many volunteers you've had already--
translation.it: Non so quanti volontari abbia già.

translation.en: [clears throat] What I'm trying to say is
technically, I'm out of a job.
translation.it: che in teoria non ho lavoro.

translation.en: As long as we're parked up here, the motor won't be needed.
translation.it: E finché siamo qui, il motore non servirà.

translation.en: I'd like to come with you, if you'd allow me.
translation.it: Vorrei venire con lei, se me lo permette.

translation.en: I'm good with a rifle, and I'm learning how to drive the dogs.
translation.it: Sono bravo con il fucile e sto imparando a guidare i cani.

translation.en: I'd really like to come, Captain.
I'll keep that in mind. Thank you, Iversen.
translation.it: Lo terrò a mente. Grazie, Iversen.

translation.en: -Looks like he needs a hand. -[Iver] Stay there.
All of you stay here, okay?
Here, let me give you a hand.
translation.it: Lascia che ti dia una mano.

translation.en: Iversen, the dogs work for you.
translation.it: Iversen, i cani lavorano per te.

translation.en: each dog can pull a hundred pounds of weight from the start.
translation.it: ogni cane può tirare un peso di 50 chili.

translation.en: Once that hundred pounds has been eaten, well, that dog becomes surplus to requirement.
translation.it: Quando quei 50 chili verranno consumati, beh, quel cane diventa un'eccedenza.

translation.en: So we shoot the worst dog, feed it to the others.
translation.it: Perciò spariamo al peggiore, e lo diamo in pasto agli altri.

translation.en: So, Iversen, don't become best friends.
translation.it: Quindi, Iversen, non farteli troppo amici.

translation.en: -[Laub] I have, sir. -What are your thoughts on him?
translation.it: - Ho sentito. - Cosa ne pensi di lui?

translation.en: Have you seen him with the dogs?
Clearly he needs to work a bit harder to improve.
translation.it: Chiaramente deve lavorarci ancora un po'.

translation.en: But you think he can do it?
[Unger] Don't be ridiculous. Surely that's too heavy.
translation.it: Non essere ridicolo. Di certo è troppo pesante.

translation.en: It's got combination turbines and reciprocating engines
translation.it: Ha turbine combinate e motori a pistoni

translation.en: guaranteed to maintain a speed of 21 knots.
translation.it: in grado di mantenere una velocità di 21 nodi.

translation.en: -Translation, anyone, please? -[man 1] What are you talking about?
translation.it: - Qualcuno può tradurre? - Cosa stai dicendo, Iver?

translation.en: [Laub] Is the Alabama not up to your standard?
translation.it: L'Alabama non è alla tua altezza?

translation.en: Go on about this with the captain, he'll put a bullet in your head.
translation.it: Continua così con il capitano, e ti sparerà in testa.

translation.en: Yeah, usually I'd say Poulsen's talking shit,
translation.it: Già, di solito Poulsen dice stronzate,

translation.en: but I've gotta agree, I daren't say two words to him.
translation.it: ma io non oserei rivolgergli la parola.

translation.en: I have to say, Iver, I think you've lost your mind.
translation.it: Devo dire, Iver, che hai perso la testa.

translation.en: What do you know about sledging, surviving on the ice when it's 40 below?
translation.it: Cosa ne sai di come si sopravvive sul ghiaccio a meno 40?

translation.en: Yeah, and polar bears and all that other scary shit out there.
translation.it: Già, e gli orsi polari e quelle robe spaventose.

translation.en: I think Iver has got quite the handle on those dogs now.
translation.it: Penso che Iver sappia gestire bene quei cani, adesso.

translation.en: It's not too late to change your mind.
translation.it: Non è tardi per cambiare idea.

translation.en: This is my third trip up here and I still hate those fucking dogs.
translation.it: Questo è il mio terzo viaggio qui e odio quei cazzo di cani.

translation.en: If they were any more inbred, they'd be sandwiches.
Once you learn to trust your lead dog, it kind of falls into place.
translation.it: Quando impari a fidarti del conduttore, va tutto liscio.

translation.en: Mine's Bjørn. He keeps the others in check. He does all the work.
translation.it: Il mio è Bjørn. Tiene gli altri in riga. Fa tutto il lavoro.

translation.en: Check out Iver and his new favorite dog, Bjørn!
translation.it: Iver e il suo cane preferito, Bjørn!

translation.en: I feel like I've let you down.
You need to get yourself right.

translation.it: E poi, Iversen si è fatto avanti.

translation.en: He wouldn't even be on this trip if our engine hadn't failed in Reykjavik.
translation.it: È con noi solo perché il motore si è rotto a Reykjavik.

translation.en: Just look after Alabama for me.
You're not a young man anymore.
You're risking your life, Iversen's life.
translation.it: Stai rischiando la tua vita. - Quella di Iversen. - Non dovremmo provare?

translation.en: You want us to give up without trying?
translation.it: - Quella di Iversen. - Non dovremmo provare?
- Abbiamo fatto il possibile. - È falso.

translation.en: Do you expect her to wait for you?
-You've got nothing to prove. -This is not about me.
translation.it: - Non devi dimostrare niente. - Non si tratta di me.

translation.en: The sea opens up by July.
translation.it: Il mare si apre entro luglio.

translation.en: If we're not back by August before the sea freezes, then you go.
translation.it: Se non torniamo ad agosto, prima che ghiacci, andate.

translation.en: -You'll basically be on your own. -That's an order.
translation.it: - In pratica sareste soli. - È un ordine.

translation.en: Iversen is the best, if not the only, man willing to make the trip.
translation.it: Iversen è il migliore, se non l'unico, disposto a partire.

translation.en: I respect your concern, but we are leaving tomorrow.
translation.it: Rispetto le tue perplessità, ma partiamo domani.

translation.en: [Laub] Iver, stand closer to the captain.
-[Poulsen] You too, Captain. -[Unger] All the best.
-Are we gonna try and get up there? -Well, there's always a way up.
translation.it: - Andremo lassù? - Beh, c'è sempre un modo per salire.

translation.en: It's just finding the quickest route.
translation.it: Bisogna trovare la via più rapida.

translation.en: I bet there's a quick way down too.
Mm, which is why I need you to concentrate at all times.
translation.it: Per questo ho bisogno che tu sia sempre concentrato.

translation.en: We need to get up to get across.
It's like we've landed on the moon.
How many cubic meters of ice do you think this is?
translation.it: Quanti metri cubi di ghiaccio saranno?

translation.en: Must be at least two million, do you think?
translation.it: Saranno almeno due milioni, non crede?

translation.en: I need you to watch where you're walking.
translation.it: Devi stare attento a dove cammini.

translation.en: [Iver] I'm reading this article you wrote about the Denmark Expedition.
translation.it: Sto leggendo questo suo articolo sulla spedizione danese.

translation.en: Now I'm here with you, reading your story.
translation.it: Ora sono qui con lei, e leggo la sua storia.

translation.en: They had so much equipment, didn't they? They even had an automobile.
translation.it: Avevano molta attrezzatura, vero? C'era anche un'automobile.

translation.en: Imagine that! Driving across the ice.
translation.it: Pensa un po'! Guidare sul ghiaccio.

translation.en: What type do you think it was, Captain?
What horsepower was the engine? Can you remember?
translation.it: Quanti cavalli aveva il motore? Si ricorda?

translation.en: Was it four to eight perhaps?
Captain, that's my lead dog, Bjørn.
translation.it: Capitano, è il mio conduttore, Bjørn.

translation.en: I think he'd like to come in the tent. Would that be okay?
translation.it: Penso che voglia entrare nella tenda. Può andare bene?

translation.en: Little wonder they got lost out here.
translation.it: Non sorprende che si siano persi qui.

translation.en: what do you think really happened
Sometimes, it's best not to think too much.
translation.it: A volte è meglio non pensare troppo.

translation.en: But he never knew when to give up.
The two others were lost in the ice.
[Ejnar] His final words in the diary and the map were all that survived.
translation.it: Le sue ultime parole nel diario e la mappa sono le sole cose rimaste.

translation.en: You never think you can't make it.
translation.it: Non pensi mai di non farcela.

translation.en: You always believe there'll be a way.
translation.it: Credi sempre che ci sarà una soluzione.
Scusa se ti abbiamo lasciato fuori.

translation.en: Captain told us we can't have you in if you make noise.
translation.it: Il capitano ha detto che non puoi entrare se fai rumore.

translation.en: Captain, I've just put that on.
Well, let me show you something.
In Alaska, they do this in these conditions to go fast.
translation.it: In Alaska lo fanno quando vogliono andare veloci.

translation.en: Just a thin layer of ice.
-See the cirrus clouds up in the north? -No, Captain.
translation.it: - Sì? - Vedi i cirri a nord? No, capitano.

translation.en: The dogs are smelling land! Slow down!
I can see him! It's Bjørn.
Get up! We'll pull the sledge up.
I've lost us two weeks' worth of dog food,
translation.it: ho perso due settimane di cibo per cani,

translation.en: I've lost us half our tea and one can of paraffin.
translation.it: ho perso metà del nostro tè e una latta di paraffina.

translation.en: -And Bjørn, Captain. -It's just a dog, Iversen.
translation.it: - E Bjørn, capitano. - È solo un cane, Iversen.

translation.en: Bringing you with me was always a risk,
but I judged your Navy background would arm you with the necessary discipline to follow orders.
translation.it: ma con la tua esperienza in Marina pensavo sapessi obbedire agli ordini.

translation.en: [sighs] Well, at least tomorrow, we'll be off the ice cap.
translation.it: Almeno domani usciremo dalla calotta glaciale.

translation.en: can I ask you a personal question?
out here, in places like this?
Don't you have someone special at home waiting for you?
translation.it: Non ha qualcuno che l'aspetta a casa?

translation.en: You can't have your mind some 2,000 miles away.
translation.it: Non puoi avere la testa a 3.000 km di distanza.

translation.en: So, why do you do this?
Why does anyone do anything? Why are you a mechanic?
translation.it: Perché si fa qualcosa? Perché sei un meccanico?

translation.en: It's all I was good at, fixing engines.
translation.it: È tutto quello che so fare, aggiustare motori.

translation.en: What did they tell you back when you joined us in Reykjavik?
translation.it: Cosa ti hanno detto quando ti sei unito a noi a Reykjavik?

translation.en: Well, I know it's to do with the Americans
translation.it: Beh, so che c'entra con gli americani

translation.en: and their claim of some land.
But, to be honest, Captain, I was just excited to go on a trip to Greenland with you
translation.it: Ma, onestamente, capitano, mi entusiasmava venire in Groenlandia con lei

translation.en: that the top of Greenland is separated by a channel from the rest of the country,
translation.it: un canale separa la parte nord della Groenlandia dal resto del paese,

translation.en: but no one's proved it yet.
Might even make you famous, Iversen.
Me, famous? I doubt the ladies would be queuing up for me.
translation.it: Famoso? Dubito che le signore farebbero la fila per me.

translation.en: Well, don't get ahead of yourself.
First, we have to find the bloody thing.
-I call her Miss Affection. -You named her?
translation.it: - È miss Tenerezza. - Hai dato un nome?

translation.en: -Miss Affection. -What sort of name is that?
-[Ejnar] What about this one? -The small, smiley one?
translation.it: - E lei? - Quella minuta e sorridente?

translation.en: -She'd laugh at my jokes. -She'd laugh at the stupid name.
translation.it: - Riderebbe alle mie battute. - Anche al nome stupido.

translation.en: Is there one that catches your eye, Captain?
[Ejnar] I rather like this one. Has she got a name?
translation.it: Mi piace questa. Ha un nome?

translation.en: [Ejnar] I'm going to call her Naja.
Unless any man here should know of any impediment,
translation.it: A meno che non ci sia un qualche impedimento,

translation.en: you and Naja shall be together from this day on.
translation.it: lei e Naja sarete insieme d'ora in poi.

translation.en: No life here. I didn't even see a bird.
translation.it: Non c'è vita qui. Neanche un uccello.

translation.en: -I've not done anything. -You must've done something.
It's not working anymore. Are you a complete idiot?
translation.it: Non funziona più. Sei un idiota?

translation.en: Without the Primus, we're as good as dead, understand?
translation.it: Senza il Primus siamo morti, hai capito?

translation.en: -You do understand that? -Can you pass the kettle, Captain?
translation.it: - Lo capisci? - Può passarmi il bollitore, capitano?

translation.en: We'll have to go half ration from now on.
translation.it: D'ora in poi mangeremo mezza razione.

translation.en: Now, we have a slight course correction we need to make.
translation.it: Abbiamo un piccolo cambio di rotta da fare.

translation.en: Is there a point where perhaps we…
translation.it: C'è un momento forse in cui…

translation.en: We have a map. We will find it.
We won't find it by standing around talking.
translation.it: Non lo troveremo restando a parlare.

translation.en: And we will be back on the Alabama by August.
We're going down to one sledge.
"Being without food for ourselves and our dogs,
translation.it: Senza più cibo per noi e per i cani

translation.en: we must leave this place and try to make our way to coastal areas with game,
translation.it: dobbiamo cercare di raggiungere le zone costiere con la selvaggina,

translation.en: enough to sledge the 580 miles back to the ship."
translation.it: sufficiente per raggiungere la nave, a 930 km."

translation.en: They had no food, Captain, but they left this.
translation.it: Non avevano cibo, capitano, ma hanno lasciato questo.

translation.en: "We discovered and leave a proof in this cairn that Peary Channel does not exist."
translation.it: "Abbiamo lasciato prova in questo ometto che il Canale di Peary non esiste.

translation.en: "Navy Cliff is joined by land to Heilprin Land, therefore our work is almost done."
translation.it: Navy Cliff è collegata via terra a Heilprin Land, dunque abbiamo finito.

translation.en: "We hope to reach the ship before the end of September, with or without dogs."
translation.it: Speriamo di tornare per fine settembre, con o senza cani.

translation.en: leader of Denmark Expedition to Northeast Greenland."
translation.it: capo spedizione in Groenlandia nord orientale."

translation.en: Robert Peary and the Americans were wrong.
translation.it: Robert Peary e gli americani sbagliavano.

translation.en: This is it. This is it.
I don't really understand why what we found is so important,
translation.it: Non capisco perché quanto abbiamo scoperto sia così importante, ma

translation.en: but seeing you smile, Captain, seeing you laugh…
The USA has no claim here.
translation.it: Gli USA non hanno diritti qui.

translation.en: Denmark will thank you one day, Iver Iversen.
translation.it: La Danimarca ti sarà grata, Iver Iversen.

translation.en: It's time to celebrate. Now you put that soup on.
translation.it: È ora di festeggiare. Metti su quella zuppa.

translation.en: We can go home now, Iversen.
Like walking from Rome to Moscow looking for a stack of stones.
translation.it: Come andare da Roma a Mosca in cerca di pietre.

translation.en: That's what the guys were saying on the ship.
Well, you can put them straight now.
translation.it: Beh, ora puoi metterli a tacere.

translation.en: Do you think we could eat the liver?
The rest is skin and bone.
translation.it: Il resto è pelle e ossa.

translation.en: about a silver spoon in a pot with anything poisonous?
translation.it: del cucchiaio d'argento immerso in qualcosa di velenoso?

translation.en: Shame we don't have any silver.
You said you didn't have anyone back home.
translation.it: Ha detto di non avere nessuno.

translation.en: -I don't remember. -No, I don't remember either.
translation.it: - Non ricordo. - No, non ricordo neanche io.

translation.en: -That's… not green. -That's more brown than green.
translation.it: - Non è verde. - È più marrone che verde.

translation.en: I can't believe this was the only thing that got torn.
translation.it: È incredibile che sia l'unica cosa che si è strappata.

translation.en: [sighs] They're different, aren't they? Their voices, their smell.
translation.it: Sono diverse, vero? Le loro voci, il loro profumo.

translation.en: I remember when I was 16, about to join the Navy,
translation.it: Quando avevo 16 anni e stavo per entrare in Marina,

translation.en: my grandfather asked if I'd go with him to Copenhagen Harbor.
translation.it: mio nonno mi chiese di andare con lui al porto di Copenaghen.

translation.en: I thought we were going to look at ships, so I went along,
translation.it: Pensavo che avremmo visto le navi, così andai,

translation.en: even packing a lunch for the two of us,
translation.it: preparai anche il pranzo al sacco,

translation.en: He wanted to make sure I was ready to set sail
translation.it: Voleva accertarsi che fossi pronto a salpare

translation.en: and, in his words, "be a man."
So he took me to the red-light district to introduce me to women,
translation.it: Mi portò nel quartiere a luci rosse per introdurmi alle donne,

translation.en: make sure I wasn't embarrassed on my travels.
translation.it: perché non mi vergognassi nei viaggi.

translation.en: [chuckles] I just went along with it.
Ended up with this older woman.
translation.it: Finii con questa donna più grande.

translation.en: she did expand my knowledge greatly.
my dad took me to the hospital,
translation.it: mio padre mi portò in ospedale,

translation.en: to show me the dire consequences of such behavior.
translation.it: per mostrarmi le orribili conseguenze di un comportamento simile.

translation.en: We have to travel light if we're gonna make it.
We'll leave everything that's not absolutely vital.
translation.it: Lasceremo tutto ciò che non sia vitale.

translation.en: There's another 200 miles to the ship.
-Why can't we go around? -We won't have time.
translation.it: - Non possiamo fare il giro? - Non c'è tempo.

translation.en: We need to build a cairn.
You don't think we can make it, do you?
translation.it: Crede che non ce la faremo?

translation.en: If we don't, we lose everything.
translation.it: Se non lo facciamo, perdiamo tutto.

translation.en: [Ejnar] At least if the proof and our journals are kept here in a cairn,
translation.it: Almeno se le prove e i nostri diari saranno conservati qui in un ometto,

translation.en: This is what happened to Mylius-Erichsen, isn't it?
I just need to lie down for a second.
[Iver] Sound the bell! -[Ejnar laughs] -Sound the bell!
They've built a hut with parts of the ship.
translation.it: Hanno fatto un capanno con parti della nave.

translation.en: No, they've left us! They've left us!
The Alabama was wrecked, crushed by the ice.
We had to leave when we had the chance.
We left enough food to last at least a year.
translation.it: Abbiamo lasciato provviste per un anno.

translation.en: -[official] Let's pray they make it back. -They want more than prayers.
translation.it: - Preghiamo che tornino. - Servirà di più che le preghiere.

translation.en: You're asking the government to fund another rescue attempt. Is that correct?
translation.it: Chiedete di finanziare un altro tentativo di salvataggio. Giusto?

translation.en: Lieutenant Laub, it's not your first visit to the Arctic, is it?
translation.it: Tenente Laub, non è la sua prima visita nell'Artico, vero?

translation.en: No, sir. It was my fourth.
And who is this man, Iver Iversen?
translation.it: E chi è quest'uomo, Iver Iversen?

translation.en: His name is not on the original crew list.
translation.it: Il nome non è sulla lista equipaggio.

translation.en: [official] No. He joined Alabama in Reykjavik.
translation.it: No. Si è unito all'Alabama a Reykjavik.

translation.en: And how come a mechanic is chosen to accompany Mikkelsen
translation.it: E come mai viene scelto un meccanico per accompagnare Mikkelsen

translation.en: Did he have any experience as an Arctic explorer?
This was his first time in the Arctic.
translation.it: Era la sua prima volta nell'Artico.

translation.en: So, three dead men the first time around and now two more on the rescue attempt.
translation.it: Quindi, tre morti la prima volta e ora altri due nel tentativo di soccorso.

translation.en: Sir, there's no proof that they're--
translation.it: Beh, non ci sono prove che siano…

translation.en: Now, you two both knew that the chances of success were minimal.
translation.it: Sapevate che le possibilità di successo erano minime.

translation.en: Even less so when you allow an inexperienced greenhorn
translation.it: Ancor meno se si permette a un novellino inesperto

translation.en: to volunteer for an early death.
translation.it: di candidarsi a una morte prematura.

translation.en: I can't possibly justify more expense on another fruitless mission.
translation.it: Non posso certo giustificare nuove spese per un'altra missione infruttuosa.

translation.en: Minister, nobody wants to waste government funds.
We were rescued by a whaler.
Perhaps if we can put up a reward.
They got picked up by a passing ship.
translation.it: Salendo su una nave di passaggio.

translation.en: The same will happen to us.
Imagine if they could see us now.
What would you do if a girl suddenly came walking towards us from across the ice?
translation.it: Cosa farebbe se all'improvviso ci venisse incontro una ragazza dai ghiacci?

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, that's not gonna happen. No, but if it did?
translation.it: - Beh, non succederà. - No, ma se succedesse?

translation.en: -Is that the guy that went missing? -Yeah. I met him once.
translation.it: - È il tizio scomparso? - Sì. Lo incontrai una volta.

translation.en: I walked all the way from Copenhagen to Gothenburg to see him.
translation.it: Andai da Copenaghen a Göteborg a piedi per vederlo.

translation.en: He was gonna fly his hot-air balloon to the North Pole.
translation.it: Voleva raggiungere il Polo Nord in mongolfiera.

translation.en: I wanted to join his expedition.
[sarcastic] Bet he was thrilled to meet a 15-year-old you!
translation.it: Chissà l'entusiasmo di conoscere un quindicenne.

translation.en: He explained to me that I was too young,
translation.it: Mi spiegò che ero troppo giovane,

translation.en: but then he paid for me to catch the train back to Copenhagen.
translation.it: ma poi mi pagò il treno per tornare a Copenaghen.

translation.en: To get the journals and the proof.
translation.it: Per recuperare i diari e le prove.

translation.en: -We should never have left it. -Right now?
translation.it: - Non avremmo mai dovuto lasciarli. - Adesso?

translation.en: We need to get back here for when the sea opens up again.
translation.it: Bisogna essere qui per quando il mare si riapre.

translation.en: -Do you think we should leave a note? -No, Iver.
translation.it: - Sarà meglio lasciare un messaggio? - No, Iver.

translation.en: As I told you, we'll be back before the ice breaks.
translation.it: Torneremo prima che si rompa il ghiaccio.

translation.en: Yeah, but it's 200 miles there and 200 miles back.
translation.it: Sì, ma sono 320 km ad andare e 320 km a tornare.

translation.en: For the love of God, can we just get going?
translation.it: Per l'amor di Dio, possiamo andare?

translation.en: They say there's truth in every dream.
translation.it: Dicono ci sia del vero nei sogni.

translation.en: Well, I hope for your sake there's no truth in my dreams.
translation.it: Spero per lei che non ci sia del vero nei miei sogni.

translation.en: I mean, I really couldn't go back.
translation.it: Non sarei potuto tornare a casa.

translation.en: "Oh, sorry, sir. It got eaten by a bear."
translation.it: "Mi dispiace, signore. L'ha mangiato un orso."

translation.en: What do you think did this?
They say there's truth in every dream, Iversen.
translation.it: C'è del vero in ogni sogno, Iversen.

translation.en: They say there's truth in every dream.
translation.it: C'è del vero in ogni sogno.

translation.en: Is that it, Captain? Is that…
Is that the car… from the Denmark Expedition?
I'm just saying it could've been worse. Could've been worse.
translation.it: Dico solo che poteva andare peggio.
- Se noi… - Non fare il furbo, Iver.

translation.en: I know what you want to say.
Yes, we should've left a fucking note!
translation.it: Sì, avremmo dovuto lasciare un cazzo di messaggio!

translation.en: [Jørgensen] Minister, when the sailor found the hut, it was boarded up.
translation.it: Ministro, il marinaio ha trovato la porta del capanno sbarrata.

translation.en: We never left it like that. Someone's been there.
translation.it: Non l'abbiamo lasciata così. C'è stato qualcuno.

translation.en: Do you mind if we walk and talk?
translation.it: Le dispiace se camminiamo mentre parliamo?
Affatto. So che è un uomo molto impegnato.

translation.en: -I know you're a very busy man. -Busy?
translation.it: Affatto. So che è un uomo molto impegnato. Impegnato?

translation.en: Thank you. The whole nation seems to be rattling a begging bowl.
translation.it: Grazie. L'intera nazione sembra chiedere l'elemosina.

translation.en: Then there's this Greenland issue where we have to convince our own people
translation.it: Il problema Groenlandia è questo. Bisogna convincere la gente

translation.en: that it's financially viable to maintain these wretched colonies, which it's not, of course,
translation.it: che sia ancora redditizio mantenere queste colonie. E non lo è, ovviamente.

translation.en: whilst trying to persuade the rest of the world that we still have some semblance of control.
translation.it: E intanto convincere il resto del mondo che abbiamo una parvenza di controllo.
Comunque, l'attività per il salvataggio di Mikkelsen…

translation.en: We appreciate and understand the importance of the work he undertook, of course.
translation.it: Ovviamente apprezziamo e capiamo l'importanza del lavoro che ha svolto.

translation.en: Sticking their little flags in the ice all over the place
translation.it: Infilzano le loro bandierine ovunque nel ghiaccio

translation.en: and this bloody Peary chap claiming the North Pole.
translation.it: e questo maledetto Peary rivendica il Polo Nord.

translation.en: We can't have that. It's ridiculous.
I'm confident that the captain secured the evidence.
translation.it: Il capitano avrà messo al sicuro le prove.

translation.en: But you don't know that, do you?
translation.it: Ma non può esserne certo, vero?

translation.en: Nor do you know where in this vast country we should send a rescue mission.
translation.it: Né sa dove inviare una missione di soccorso in questo vasto territorio.

translation.en: -I know this is difficult for you to bear. -They won't survive another year.
translation.it: - So che è difficile da accettare. - Non dureranno un altro anno.

translation.en: If we don't get a ship there before the ice freezes next summer,
translation.it: Se non mandiamo una nave prima che l'acqua geli,

translation.en: not only do we give up on them, but we also give up on Greenland.
translation.it: non solo abbandoneremo loro, ma anche la Groenlandia.

translation.en: We have already offered a very generous reward.
translation.it: Abbiamo offerto una ricompensa molto generosa.

translation.en: More than that, I cannot do.
translation.it: Non posso fare più di così.

translation.en: -But would you, Captain? -Honestly, Iver, I don't know.
translation.it: - Lo farebbe, capitano? - Sinceramente, non so.

translation.en: Actually, can we just leave it?
This is our first Christmas here, in the hut?
translation.it: È il nostro primo Natale, qui nella baracca?
- Buon Natale, Iver. - Buon Natale, capitano.

translation.en: I'll tell you something that I know for certain.
translation.it: Le dirò una cosa che so per certa,

translation.en: It's that whilst you still had your hands, I couldn't…
translation.it: è cioè che finché avesse le mani, non potrei…

translation.en: Or at the very least fingers.
I don't like talking about it or thinking about it,
translation.it: Sì, non mi piace parlarne o pensarci,

translation.en: but for me, it's hands that distinguish humans from animals.
translation.it: ma per me sono le mani a distinguere gli umani dagli animali.

translation.en: It's with our hands we can do all the things that animals can't do.
translation.it: Con le mani riusciamo a fare tutto ciò che gli animali non sanno fare.

translation.en: So if my hands were removed before I die?
translation.it: Quindi: se mi venissero tolte le mani in vita?

translation.en: Yeah, then… Yeah, I could quite happily eat you.
translation.it: Sì, a quel punto… Sì, la mangerei volentieri.

translation.en: I just missed you so much.
Captain, it's getting cold out here. Come back inside.
translation.it: Capitano, si sta facendo freddo. Torni dentro.

translation.en: The ice isn't completely impassable yet, is it?
translation.it: Il ghiaccio non è ancora impraticabile, no?

translation.en: I think he's taken it hard.
We need to keep an eye on him,
make sure things don't get too much.
translation.it: verificare che le cose non peggiorino.

translation.en: Do you believe in ghosts, Captain?
translation.it: - Lei crede nei fantasmi, capitano? - Fantasmi?
Tipo morti che girano tra noi?

translation.en: No. Just up on the hill.
Wh-what do you mean you met him?
You sensed him? You felt his presence?
I think he may have passed away
It doesn't necessarily mean he's dead.
translation.it: Non è detto che sia morto.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm… I'm really sorry.
-If there's anything I can, you know-- -I know.
translation.it: - Se c'è qualcosa che posso fare… - Lo so.

translation.en: [Naja] What if you never come home?
translation.it: E se non tornassi più a casa?

translation.en: -We were going to get married. -I didn't have an option.
-I couldn't see another way. -Someone else could do this. Why you?
translation.it: - Non vedevo alternative. - Potevano farlo altri. Perché tu?

translation.en: No one else could have done this.
I don't know why it had to be me, but it did. It was always going to be me.
translation.it: Non so perché dovessi essere io, ma è così. Ero destinato a questo.

translation.en: What about Iver? Did he have a choice?
He volunteered. He knew the dangers.
translation.it: Si è offerto volontario. Conosceva i rischi.

translation.en: You do know that no one is coming to get you?
translation.it: Sai, vero, che nessuno verrà a prendervi?
- Non essere sciocco. Fa' vedere. - No.

translation.en: Get out. Get out! Get out!
How's the, um, neck holding up?
I almost feel guilty about it.
but I guess last night, she decided to pick me,
translation.it: ma ieri sera lei ha scelto me,

translation.en: if you know what I mean.
Did you see the tracks outside?
I'll go and have a look. Might be a rabbit or something.
translation.it: Andrò a dare un'occhiata. Potrebbe essere un coniglio.

translation.en: [Ejnar] You took her! You took her! You took her!
-Captain, put it down. -[Naja] Don't do this!
translation.it: - Capitano, lo metta giù. - Non farlo!

translation.en: -Calm down. -[Naja] Don't do this. It's not real.
translation.it: Si calmi. Non farlo. Non è reale.

translation.en: -Don't do this! -[Iver] Put the gun down.

translation.it: - La metta giù, no! - Ejnar, fermo, no!

translation.en: How much food do we have left?
One chance. One shot. Don't miss.
translation.it: Una possibilità. Un colpo. Non sbagliare.

translation.en: [Neergaard] What is the single most important task for an explorer?
translation.it: Qual è il compito più importante per un esploratore?

translation.en: When you travel into unknown lands to discover new parts of the globe,
translation.it: Quando attraversi terre sconosciute per scoprire nuove parti del globo,

translation.en: it is to ensure the records of your discoveries
translation.it: devi garantire che i documenti delle tue scoperte

translation.en: are delivered back safe and sound,
Otherwise, it is all in vain.
The blood, sweat and tears would all be for nothing.
translation.it: Il sangue, il sudore e le lacrime non servirebbero a niente.

translation.en: Unlike the honorable members of the Danish press,
translation.it: A differenza degli onorevoli membri della stampa danese,

translation.en: we in the Danish government never doubted for a second
translation.it: il governo danese non ha mai dubitato per un secondo

translation.en: that Captain Mikkelsen would return home safe and sound.
translation.it: che il capitano Mikkelsen sarebbe tornato a casa sano e salvo.

translation.en: We played our part in ensuring the safe return of a Danish hero.
translation.it: Abbiamo avuto il nostro ruolo nel garantire il ritorno a un eroe danese.

translation.en: I wouldn't be standing here if it wasn't for you.
translation.it: Non sarei qui se non fosse per te.

translation.en: "Based on the findings brought back by Captain Ejnar Mikkelsen,
translation.it: Sulla base delle scoperte riportate dal capitano Ejnar Mikkelsen,

translation.en: that Peary Land is not an island,
translation.it: che Peary Land non è un'isola,

translation.en: -[Neergaard] It gives me great pleasure… -Congratulations, gentlemen.
…to be the first person to welcome home
translation.it: …di essere la prima persona ad accogliere

translation.en: the men who made the impossible possible.
translation.it: gli uomini che hanno reso possibile l'impossibile.

translation.en: -It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss… -Holm.
It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss Holm.
translation.it: È un piacere conoscerla, signorina Holm.

translation.en: [chuckles] They have returned, I promise you!
